item.title: Cant get xp while playing only when i relog i can see the xp i earned
item.dc:creator: @Hackerz Hackerz
item.description:
@Hackerz wrote:

you need to go into you client file and make it so when you get xp you update

updateRequired = true;

add that under every were you gain exp[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 18, 2008, 10:06:58 AM[/size][hr]what that will do is when ever you earn anytype of exp it will update you character

Read full topic
